plot outline: Virat and Megha's love blooms in heir college years. Virat's life takes a total turmoil when his mother suffers kidney failure. He shifts from Mehsana to Ahmedabad for a job as well as managing kidney donor from reputed hospitals of the mega city. In spite of his constant attempts, he doesn't succeed to find a donor. In the meanwhile, his love life takes a major setback due to his anger. Is he finally able to find a donor for his ailing mother and save his love life from hitting rock bottom?
title: Tu Chhe Ne

He shifts from Mehsana to Ahmedabad for a job as well as managing kidney donor from reputed hospitals of the mega city. In spite of his constant attempts, he doesn't succeed to find a donor. In the meanwhile, his love life takes a major setback due to his anger. Is he finally able to find a donor for his ailing mother and save his love life from hitting rock bottom?
